title: i have been banned for suspicious activity on my account for reasons unknown
body:
hi everyone, talzmehalz here, ok so... where to begin, well it all started a few weeks back when i received and email saying that i had requested my password to be changed, i thought nothing of it i thought it might have been a mistake or a prank, a few days later i purchase some RP because i want to get the new gold worlds icon, and some chests and keys, all is good, i log out, to come back the next day to a permanent ban, i have just gotten to gold, worked my butt off all year to get there, and come back to a perm ban,  THE REASON, i have come here is because i have given RIOT SUPPORT, evidence that the account is mine, no doubt about it.

I provided over 4 screen shots of purchased rp from this year, i even provided my youtube channel of me doing multiple commentaries dating back to as early as 2013 on this account, i am baffled as to how this is not enough proof?

Can i please get an explanation or at least help to get my permanent ban lifted, 

Thankyou.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sorry for not getting to this sooner, we edited your post to redact all the sensitive information regarding account recovery that you posted.

Do you have a ticket number for this case? I'll see if I can get another set of eyes onto it to make sure nothing was missed.
Hi sephiroth, i havent heard back from anyone yet ? Will i have my account returned? Ive spent too much time and money on this game to be randomly banned

Hey there,

I'm unable to provide you any additional info than what you've received from Player Support via your ticket or tickets.

thank you for looking into this, i know i dont have alot of info from when i created the account, but i'm certain there is definitely enough to recover my account

my ticket number is : #23668581

thanks so much for your help, would love to be able to play again i'm having withdrawals haha!
Well that sucks mate, Riot better get back to you.

yeah mate, its pretty rough, ive spent alot of money on it, well into the thousands i would say, and for me to be told i dont have enough information blew me away, hard when i made the account over 7 years ago in season 1 im pretty sure.

Still no replys, god damn. This is some bad support. Have all they said is you don't have enough information and nothing else? how could they not accept all those screen shots and videos, what more proof do they want. Maybe show them bank statements of your RP purchase? hope you eventually get it back.
Yeah in email they keep saying i dont have enough information, so i might have to just start up another account recovery, and do what you said i think.
May i please have some help retrieving my account, its been 2 years since ive been able to play.

Hey Talzmehalz,

Your best bet will be through Player Support. If you haven't done so already, go through the [Recovering Your Account](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751694-Recovering-Your-Account) Riot Support article to prepare your support request. 

Good luck!
is anyone going to look into this? ive been trying to get an answer for weeks now!

I have given substantial evidence i created the account and own the account, i have done commentary on this account many times and linked you the videos of me doing commentary on my account dating back to 2013, i also sent 4 rp purchase screenshots from this year alone, and i explained i made the account in new zealand before i moved to australia, on top of that i have the current username, password and email of my account right now and im speaking from it now, i have done enough waiting around, i mean i worked so hard this year to get where i am at gold 5, i have spent so much time on your game, im so confused as to how this has happened.
